category: news
title: "Report: South Carolina ranked 40th for its political free speech protections"
excerpt: "A recent report on how states restrict free speech ranked South Carolina 40th for its protections. The index from the Institute for Free Speech ranked states in 10 categories on everything from political committee laws and campaign expenditure definition to Super PAC recognition and false statement laws."
